author: Simon Difford
description: Achieving the right dilution and a good chill are essential to the enjoyment of this sublime classic.
name: Old Fashioned Cocktail (Difford's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
